# isSearching

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the search is in progress.

## Declaration

```swift
var isSearching: Bool { get }
```

## Discussion

The search object sets the value of this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] when you initiate a search. It remains in that state until the search object delivers search results (or an appropriate error), at which time the search object sets the value of the property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false].

## Performing the search

- **start(completionHandler:)**: Starts the search and delivers the results to the specified completion handler.
- **MKLocalSearch.CompletionHandler**: A completion handler block for a search operation.
- **cancel()**: Cancels an in-progress search operation.
